data.name: APPRAISAL_CONTINUE
data.value: Do you have anything else to give me?

data.name: APPRAISAL_CONFIRM
data.value: Alright![pause=0] I'll take care of this.

data.name: APPRAISAL_DEPOSIT
data.value: What do you want to open?[pause=0] It'll cost you {0} for every box. (Choose multiple items with {1})

data.name: APPRAISAL_DEPOSIT_DESC
data.value: Leave another Box to this Appraisal shop.

data.name: APPRAISAL_INFO_1
data.value: This shop specializes in opening boxes!

data.name: APPRAISAL_INFO_2
data.value: You can leave a number of boxes to me,[pause=10] and i'll work on opening them for you.

data.name: APPRAISAL_INFO_3
data.value: Every type of box has its own durability. You will be able to retrieve the contents only when it reaches 0.

data.name: APPRAISAL_INFO_4
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase our stock limit and the speed at which we can work!

data.name: APPRAISAL_INTRO
data.value: Welcome to {0} Appraisals![pause=0] Do you have any boxes to open?

data.name: CAFE_CRAFT_BEGIN
data.value: Of course![pause=0] What do you want to make?

data.name: CAFE_CRAFT_CONTINUE
data.value: Do you want to make something else?

data.name: CAFE_DAILY_BUY_END
data.value: Here you go.[pause=0] Please enjoy it!

data.name: CAFE_DAILY_BUY_CONTINUE
data.value: May i interest you in our other daily offer?

data.name: CAFE_DRINK_MULTI
data.value: A drink with these ingredients will cost you {0}.[pause=0] Is that ok?

data.name: CAFE_DRINK_NO_MONEY
data.value: Drinks have a fee of {0} per ingredient.[pause=0] You don't seem to have enough money right now.

data.name: CAFE_DRINK_ONE
data.value: A drink with {1} will cost you {0}.[pause=0] Is that ok?

data.name: CAFE_DRINK_WHAT
data.value: What should i use for the drink?[pause=0] It's {0} per ingredient. (Choose multiple items with {1})

data.name: CAFE_DRINK_WHAT_FREE
data.value: What should i use for the drink? (Choose multiple items with {0})

data.name: CAFE_INFO_1
data.value: This shop specializes in turning food into drinks!

data.name: CAFE_INFO_2
data.value: You can give me ingredients to use,[pause=10] and,[pause=10] for a small fee,[pause=10] i will turn them into stat-enhancing juice!

data.name: CAFE_INFO_2b
data.value: You can give me ingredients to use,[pause=10] and i will turn them into stat-enhancing juice!

data.name: CAFE_INFO_3
data.value: I can also blend some of your items, turning them into different things!

data.name: CAFE_INFO_4
data.value: I even have a special offer i rotate daily,[pause=10] so don't forget to come by often!

data.name: CAFE_INFO_4b
data.value: I even have a little stash of special offers i rotate daily,[pause=10] so don't forget to come by often!

data.name: CAFE_INFO_5
data.value: Make sure to invest in my shop to allow me to turn into drinks new types of items and to unlock new services!

data.name: CAFE_INFO_5b
data.value: Make sure to invest in my shop to allow me to turn into drinks new types of items,[pause=10] increase the variety of my stock,[pause=10] and to unlock new services!

data.name: CAFE_INFO_5c
data.value: Make sure to invest in my shop to allow me to turn into drinks new types of items,[pause=10] increase the variety of my stock,[pause=10] and to craft new things!

data.name: CAFE_INTRO
data.value: Welcome to {0} Café![pause=0] How may i serve you?

data.name: CAFE_NO_MONEY
data.value: You don't seem to have the money for that.

data.name: CAFE_NO_MONEY_MIN
data.value: You need at least {0} to order a drink.

data.name: CAFE_OUT_OF_STOCK
data.value: Sorry,[pause=10] but i'm out of stock for today.

data.name: DLG_ITEM_TO_STORAGE
data.value: The item was sent to storage.

data.name: DLG_ITEMS_TO_STORAGE
data.value: The items were sent to storage.

data.name: EXPORTER_CONFIRM_GIVE_MANY
data.value: Sure![pause=0] We'll sell these items for you.

data.name: EXPORTER_CONFIRM_GIVE_ONE
data.value: Sure![pause=0] We'll sell this {0} for you.

data.name: EXPORTER_CONFIRM_TAKE
data.value: Are you sure you want to take this {0} back?[pause=0] All progress gone towards selling it will be lost.

data.name: EXPORTER_DEPOSIT
data.value: Sure thing![pause=0] What do you want to sell? (Choose multiple items with {0})

data.name: EXPORTER_DEPOSIT_DESC
data.value: Leave another item to this Exporter shop.

data.name: EXPORTER_GET_EARNINGS
data.value: We managed to sell {0} item{1} since your last visit.[pause=0] Here's your cut of the earnings.

data.name: EXPORTER_INFO_1
data.value: This shop specializes in exporting items!

data.name: EXPORTER_INFO_2
data.value: You can leave a number of items to me,[pause=10] and i'll make sure to find a buyer for them.

data.name: EXPORTER_INFO_3
data.value: More expensive items will take more time to sell than cheap ones.

data.name: EXPORTER_INFO_4
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase our stock limit and the speed at which we can sell!

data.name: EXPORTER_NO_EARNINGS
data.value: Sorry,[pause=10] we still haven't sold anything since last time.

data.name: EXPORTER_INTRO
data.value: Welcome to {0} Exports![pause=0] How can I assist you today?

data.name: MARKET_INFO_1
data.value: This shop specializes in selling items!

data.name: MARKET_INFO_2
data.value: These items can then be brought along in adventures.

data.name: MARKET_INFO_3
data.value: If we're ever out of stock,[pause=10] we'll always have new items ready when you return from an adventure.

data.name: MARKET_INFO_4
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase the variety and amount of items we can offer!

data.name: MARKET_INTRO
data.value: Welcome to {0} Market![pause=0] Are you here to buy?

data.name: MARKET_NO_MONEY
data.value: I'm afraid you don't have the money for that!

data.name: MARKET_OUT_OF_STOCK
data.value: I'm sorry, but i'm out of stock.[pause=0] Please come back tomorrow.'

data.name: MARKET_POOL_EXPAND_DESCR
data.value: Increase the amount of slots reserved for

data.name: MARKET_POOL_TIER_DESCR
data.value: Allow the shop to sell better

data.name: MARKET_POOL_UNLOCK_DESCR
data.value: Add a new section dedicated to

data.name: MARKET_REPEAT
data.value: May I help you with anything else?

data.name: OFFICE_ACTION_CONFIRM
data.value: Perfect.[pause=0] Your changes will be visible as soon as you leave the Office.

data.name: OFFICE_BUILD_ASK
data.value: So you want to add a new {0} using {1}?

data.name: OFFICE_BUILD_SHOP
data.value: Perfect![pause=0] The new {0} should be ready by the time you leave the Office.

data.name: OFFICE_CANNOT_BUILD
data.value: Looks like we don't have enough material to build this shop.

data.name: OFFICE_CANNOT_UPGRADE
data.value: Looks like we don't have enough material to upgrade this shop.

data.name: OFFICE_CANNOT_UPGRADE_TOWN
data.value: Looks like we don't have enough material to upgrade the {0} right now.

data.name: OFFICE_DEMOLISH_ASK
data.value: Are you really sure you want to demolish this {0}?

data.name: OFFICE_DEMOLISH_SHOP
data.value: Very well.[pause=0] It will be gone before you know it.

data.name: OFFICE_DEMOLISH_SHOP_NO_SALVAGE
data.value: Nothing was able to be salvaged during demolition.

data.name: OFFICE_INFO_1
data.value: This is my Office,[pause=10] the base of operations for {0}.

data.name: OFFICE_INFO_2
data.value: Here you can add new buildings to the {0} and upgrade them in exchange for various materials.

data.name: OFFICE_INFO_3
data.value: You can also upgrade the {0} itself, allowing you to build more shops.

data.name: OFFICE_INFO_3b
data.value: You can also rename the {0} itself and upgrade it, allowing you to build more shops.

data.name: OFFICE_INFO_3c
data.value: You can also rename the {0} itself if you so desire.

data.name: OFFICE_INFO_4
data.value: The Federation also periodically sends us requests,[pause=10] so i keep track of them for you,[pause=10) too.

data.name: OFFICE_INFO_5
data.value: Some hove these requests may have some pretty valuable rewards,[pause=10] but,[pause=10] in the end,[pause=10] tackling them or not is up to you.

data.name: OFFICE_RECLAIM_ASK
data.value: You have {1} {0}.[pause=0] You will need to spend {2} to reclaim this plot.[pause=0] Is that ok?

data.name: OFFICE_RECLAIM_CANNOT
data.value: Looks like we only have {1} {0}.[pause=0] That's not enough to reclaim this plot.

data.name: OFFICE_RECLAIM_ZERO
data.value: Looks like we don't have any {0}.[pause=0] We can't reclaim this plot without some.

data.name: OFFICE_RANK_NAME_PROMPT
data.value: Do you want to {0} the word "{1}" {2} the {1} name?

data.name: OFFICE_TEAM_RENAME_ASK
data.value: How would you like to rename your team?

data.name: OFFICE_TEAM_RENAME_END
data.value: Okay![pause=0] From now on,[pause=10] your team will be called [color=#FFA5FF]{1}[color]!

data.name: OFFICE_TOWN_RENAME_ASK
data.value: How would you like to rename the {0}?

data.name: OFFICE_TOWN_RENAME_END
data.value: Okay![pause=0] From now on,[pause=10] this {0} will be called {1}!

data.name: OFFICE_UPGRADE_ASK
data.value: So you want to upgrade this {0} using {1}?

data.name: OFFICE_UPGRADE_TOWN_ASK
data.value: So you want to upgrade the {0} using {1}?

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_APPRAISAL_BASE
data.value: Can hold {0} items. Consumes {1} durability each day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_APPRAISAL_BOOST
data.value: All boxes require slightly less work to be opened.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_APPRAISAL_INSTANT
data.value: Has a 25% chance to open a random extra box each day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_APPRAISAL
data.value: You can give locked boxes to this shop to open them over time.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_EXPORTER
data.value: You can give items to this shop to sell them over time. Higher prices take more time.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_MARKET
data.value: Allows you to buy various items. Its stock is refreshed every day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_TRADER
data.value: Exchanges Exclusive Items. Its stock is refreshed every day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_MULTI_CHOICE
data.value: The cost for building this shop depends on what option you will choose in the next menu.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_CAFE_DAILY_ONE
data.value: Sells a random food item each day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_CAFE_DAILY_MORE
data.value: Sells {0} random food items each day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_EXPORTER_BASE
data.value: Can hold {0} items. Gains {1} progress per day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_EXPORTER_BOOST
data.value: All items require slightly less progress to be sold.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_EXPORTER_DEPOSIT
data.value: Deposits all new earnings in the bank.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_EXPORTER_INSTANT
data.value: Has a 25% chance to sell an extra item each day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_LOCKED
data.value: A plot of land overrun with greenery. It needs to be reclaimed using some {0} before it can house a building.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_MOVE_CANNOT
data.value: You cannot build here right now.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_MOVE_SOURCE
data.value: This is the original position of {0}.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_OUT_OF_LIMIT
data.value: [color=#FF0000]To reclaim this plot you must first upgrade the {0} to level {1}.[color]

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_TRADER_ADVANTAGE
data.value: Every item has a chance to be rerolled if it isn't for a pokémon in the last used team.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_TRADER_GUARANTEE
data.value: Has a very high chance of offering an item for a pokémon in the last used team.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_TUTOR_BASE
data.value: Teaches level moves up to level {0}.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_UNLOCKED
data.value: A clear plot of land that is ready to house a new building.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_UPGRADE_MULTI_CHOICE
data.value: The cost of this upgrade depends on what option you will choose in the next menu.\n

data.name: SHOP_MANAGER_DESCR_DEMOLISH
data.value: Remove this shop in its entirety.\nEvery material spent on this shop has a chance to be salvaged.

data.name: SHOP_MANAGER_DESCR_MOVE
data.value: Move this shop to another, already reclaimed plot.\nIf the destination plot houses another shop, the two will swap places.

data.name: SHOP_MANAGER_DESCR_UPGRADE_COST
data.value: Upgrading this shop will use {0} from your Storage.\n

data.name: SHOP_MANAGER_DESCR_UPGRADE_LOCKED
data.value: [color=#FF0000]You cannot upgrade this shop further until the {0} reaches the next rank.[color]\n

data.name: SHOP_MANAGER_DESCR_UPGRADE_MULTI
data.value: The cost to upgrade this shop depends on what upgrade you will choose in the next menu.\n

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_BUILDINGS
data.value: Unlock plots of land, build and upgrade shops to grow the {0}.

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_RENAME_FINAL
data.value: Change the name of the {0}. You can also remove the word "{0}" from its full name if you want.

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_UPGRADE
data.value: Upgrade the {0} using {1} from your Storage.

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_UPGRADE_LOCKED
data.value: [color=#FF0000]You must have at least one shop at level {0} to do this![color]

data.name: TRADER_ASK_TRIBUTE
data.value: Please choose {0} items to give in exchange for this {1}.

data.name: TRADER_CANNOT_TRADE
data.value: You don't seem have anything to trade, though...

data.name: TRADER_CONFIRM_SWAP_2
data.value: It'll cost you {0}, is that ok?

data.name: TRADER_INFO_1
data.value: My job is exchanging exclusive items.

data.name: TRADER_INFO_2
data.value: I offer a different selection of items each day.

data.name: TRADER_INFO_3
data.value: I can also fuse exclusive items for you, turning them into a rarer one.

data.name: TRADER_INFO_4
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase the amount of items offered and the chance of finding something interesting for you!

data.name: TRADER_INTRO
data.value: Welcome to {0}'s Trading shop![pause=0] How can i help you?

data.name: TUTOR_FORGET_WHO
data.value: Who wants to forget a move?

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_1
data.value: This shop specializes in teaching and removing moves.

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_2
data.value: We can teach a Pokémon any move it would learn up to a certain level.[pause=0] A move's price scales with the level.

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_3
data.value: We can also help Pokémon forget moves,[pause=10] free of charge!

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_4
data.value: Careful,[pause=10] though:[pause=20] if you forget a TM,[pause=10] you won't be able to learn it again here.

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_5
data.value: We can also teach {0} moves! Our stock changes from time to time, so come back frequently to check it out!

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_6
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase our level limit!

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_6b
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase our level limit and the amount of {0} moves we can offer!

data.name: TUTOR_INTRO
data.value: This is {0} Tutor Services![pause=0] Are you ready to learn?

data.name: TUTOR_LEARN_WHO
data.value: Who wants to learn a new move?

data.name: TUTOR_POOL_EGG_DESCR
data.value: This shop will start to offer randomly chosen Egg moves that are guaranteed to be accessible to at least 1 Pokémon in your assembly, in exchange for [color=#FFCEFF]Heart Scales[color].\n The moves offered change every few days.

data.name: TUTOR_POOL_TUTOR_DESCR
data.value: This shop will start to offer randomly chosen Tutor moves that are guaranteed to be accessible to at least 1 Pokémon in your assembly, in exchange for [color=#FFCEFF]Heart Scales[color].\n The moves offered change every few days.

data.name: TUTOR_REPLACE
data.value: We'll need to replace a move.[pause=0] What'll it be?

data.name: UPGRADE_MARKET_EXPAND_DESCR
data.value: Increase the number of slots reserved for items of a specific kind by 1.\n

data.name: UPGRADE_MARKET_SPECIALIZE_DESCR
data.value: Give a section of the shop a daily chance of having one of its items on sale.\n

data.name: UPGRADE_MARKET_TIER_DESCR
data.value: Allow the shop to sell more powerful items of a specific kind.\n

data.name: UPGRADE_MARKET_UNLOCK_DESCR
data.value: Add another section to the shop, allowing it to sell new kinds of items.\n

data.name: UPGRADE_TUTOR_FREQUENCY_DESCR
data.value: Daily moves are rolled more frequently.
